mapper.insert: insert into USERINFO (USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, USERPHONE, USEREMAIL, USERCAR, USERREGDATE, USERTYPE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userPhone} ,#{userEmail} , #{userCar}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, USERPHONE, USEREMAIL, USERCAR, USERREGDATE, USERTYPE, COMPID from USERINFO where USERID = #{id}
